platform.title: Nectar Cloud
platform.summary: Set up a Galaxy server on Australia's Nectar research cloud.
comments: Nectar based Galaxy instances can be easily started from CloudLaunch.  They are based on the Genomics Virtual Laboratory (GVL).
user_support: [Launching a Personal GVL Server on the NeCTAR Research Cloud](https://melbournebioinformatics.github.io/MelBioInf_docs/tutorials/gvl_launch/gvl_launch/)
sponsors: Melbourne Bioinformatics and the Australian Research Data Commons.
